Table of Contents

Class TodoListHub

Represents the hub for managing todo tasks in workspaces. Notifies ITodoListClient about changes in todo tasks

Namespace: Realtime_ToDo_Web_API.Hubs

Methods

AddTask(string, DateTime?)

Add new task to the connected workspace.

Parameters

title string

The title of the task.

deadline DateTime?

The deadline of the task.

ConnectToWorkspace(int)

Connect to a workspace with the specified ID.

Parameters

workspaceId int

The ID of the workspace to connect to.

If you alredy connected to a workspace, you will be automatiacally disconnected from it

DeleteTask(int)

Delete a task from the connected workspace.

Parameters

taskId int

The ID of the task to delete.

DisconnectFromWorkspace()

Disconnect from the currently connected workspace.

OnConnectedAsync()

Called when a connection is established with the hub.

Clients should not try to call this method, as it is called automatically.

While you are connecting to the hub, you can specify workspaceid query string to automatically connect to specified workspace.

OnDisconnectedAsync(Exception?)

Called when a connection to the hub is terminated.

Parameters

exception Exception

The exception that caused the disconnection.

Clients should not try to call this method, as it is called automatically

UpdateTask(int, TodoTask)

Update an existing task in the connected workspace.

Parameters

taskId int

The ID of the task to update.

newTask TodoTask

New task object.

UpdateTaskCompleted(int, bool)

Update the completion status of a task in the connected workspace.

Parameters

taskId int

The ID of the task to update.

newCompleted bool

The new completion status of the task.

UpdateTaskDeadline(int, DateTime)

Update the deadline of a task in the connected workspace.

Parameters

taskId int

The ID of the task to update.

newDeadline DateTime

The new deadline of the task.

UpdateTaskOrder(int, int)

Update the order of a task in the connected workspace.

Parameters

taskId int

The ID of the task to update.

destinationOrder int

The new order of the task.

UpdateTaskTitle(int, string)

Update the title of a task in the connected workspace.

Parameters

taskId int

The ID of the task to update.

newTitle string

The new title of the task.
